item.title: Analysis on Northern Hemishpere temperature
item.description: Climate change and temperature anomalies The aim of this project was to define temperature anomalies within the Northern Hemisphere considering as a base period the one between 1951 and 1980. In order to carry out my observations, I have utilized data provided by the NASAâ€™s Goddard Institute for Space Studies. weather <- read_csv("https://data.giss.nasa.gov/gistemp/tabledata_v3/NH.Ts+dSST.csv", skip = 1, na = "***") tidyweather <- weather %>% select(Year:Dec) %>% pivot_longer(cols=c('Jan':'Dec'),names_to="Month",values_to="delta") Plots I have plotted the data using a time-series scatter plot, and adding a trendline.
